Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Criminal Justice and the Committee on General Welfare

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Criminal Justice and the Committee on General Welfare
Oversight - Educational Programming in Jails and Juvenile Detention.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Educational Programming in Jails and Juvenile Detention.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education, the administration for children’s services and the department of correction to report on educational programming for juvenile delinquents, juvenile offenders and adolescent offenders
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring DOE, ACS and DOC to report on educational programming for juvenile delinquents, juvenile offenders and adolescent offenders.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Powers, Van Bramer, Gibson, Reynoso, Rosenthal, Holden, D. Diaz, Rivera and Adams

Items.Title: Oversight - Educational Programming in Jails and Juvenile Detention.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Educational Programming in Jails and Juvenile Detention.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education, the administration for children’s services and the department of correction to report on educational programming for juvenile delinquents, juvenile offenders and adolescent offenders
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring DOE, ACS and DOC to report on educational programming for juvenile delinquents, juvenile offenders and adolescent offenders.
